definition: lit. sitting at ease in a fishing boat despite wind and storm (idiom); to stay calm during tense situation/a cool head in a crisis
pinyin: ren4 ping2 feng1 lang4 qi3 , wen3 zuo4 diao4 yu2 tai2
containing_words.word: 任凭风浪起，稳坐钓鱼台

sentences.english: I am sailing against waves and squalls on the rough icy sea.
sentences.chinese: 迎着风浪，冒着沉没的危险，我在冰海中艰难地航行。

sentences.english: Wind and water move these grains to many places along the shore.
sentences.chinese: 风浪又把这些沙粒沿着海岸线带到许多地方。

sentences.english: Not for 4 and 2 above sea-level storm over open water.
sentences.chinese: 不能用于4级风浪以上海面及二级以上开放河道。

sentences.english: In winter the sea tends to be very rough.
On the other hand, to utilize wind field data to calculate wind-wave, then to confirm the wave factors of deep waters indirectly.
sentences.chinese: 二是利用风场资料间接推算风浪场来确定深水波要素。

sentences.english: May the road rise up to greet you, and the wind always be at your back.
sentences.chinese: 愿道路奋起欢迎你，愿风浪常在你身后。

sentences.english: It’s that fighting-the-waves and drained-by-the-sun kind of tired.
sentences.chinese: 那种疲惫就像是在烈日下搏击风浪。

sentences.english: These storms also cause high waves and ocean surges .
sentences.chinese: 这些风暴可以导致很高的风浪和海涌。

sentences.english: To confirm draught on the stormy waves, a specific communicating vessel is designed, by which central surface of waves can be displayed.
sentences.chinese: 为确定有风浪时船舶的吃水值，设计了特殊的连通器。

sentences.english: Board Sailing is now one of the events in the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 如今风浪板已成为奥运会的正式竞赛项目之一。

sentences.english: Without the core our party wouldn't stand the test of difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 没有这样一个核心，党就经不起风浪考验。

sentences.english: The masonry facing of the embankment was destroyed seriously by stormy waves.
sentences.chinese: 围坝上游干砌石护坡在风浪淘刷下，发生严重塌陷。

sentences.english: The ship combatted with the wind and waves.
In 28, for the most competent pilot who is always particularly the surging waves.
sentences.chinese: 对于最有能力的领航人风浪总是格外的汹涌。

sentences.english: All these events toss the mind like a boat on a choppy ocean.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些折磨着脑袋，就如小船在大洋风浪中般无助。

definition: lit. large waves in windless conditions (idiom)/fig. trouble arising unexpectedly
lit. breeze is still, waves are quiet (idiom); tranquil environment/all is quiet/a dead calm (at sea)
to capsize/(fig.) to suffer a setback or defeat
billows/great waves (fig. of a story with great momentum)
(of a ship) to strike a reef/(fig.) to hit a snag
